thread.section_title: FlightNetwork.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of FlightNetwork.com | www.flightnetwork.com
thread.title: Justyna Kedron

author: Justyna Kedron
title: Justyna Kedron
text: I've booked few flights through Flight Network and never had any issues. The site is easy to maneuver and I always get best prices here. Yes, I still compare. My only wish is that there was an option to select flights not only by 'direct flight' but also by how many stop overs. Other than that I find this to be the best, easiest and super quick site. Even when I call in the call centre is quick to answer and super friendly.
